text: Jiaru tamen zunxing “tao la te” he “yin ji lei”, yiji [xianzai] cong tamen de zhu jiang shi tamen de jingdian [“gulanjing”], name, tamen bi jiang shiyong cong tamen shangmian jiang shi de [ru fengtiaoyushun], yiji cong tamen jiaoxia shou ci de [da dishang ke shiyong de shiwu]. Tamen zhong you yiqun zunxing zhengdao zhe [zhu][zun qishi, xin mu sheng, ru a bu du la•ben•se lia mu], dan tamen zhong de xuduo ren shi zuo'e zhe.
